meanings.definition: Having a strong and unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The garbage was stenchy and made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The stenchy socks needed to be washed immediately.
meanings.sent3: The stenchy cheese made everyone in the room wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The stenchy alley behind the restaurant was a breeding ground for rats.
meanings.sent5: The stenchy smell of rotten eggs filled the kitchen, making it unbearable to stay.

meanings.sent1: The stenchy dumpster behind the building was attracting flies.
meanings.sent2: The stenchy skunk sprayed its odor to ward off predators.
meanings.sent3: The stenchy socks in the laundry basket seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent4: The stenchy smell of the swamp lingered in the air long after we left.
meanings.sent5: The stenchy aroma of the sewage plant made my stomach turn.
